summary:
Ra was an ancient Egyptian god, considered one of the most important. He represented the sun and ruled over the sky, Earth, and underworld. Often shown as a falcon, Ra was linked to Horus, another sky god, creating Ra-Horakhty. He was also combined with Amun, forming Amun-Ra.

Ra was believed to have created all life. According to myths, humans came from his tears and sweat. The Egyptians even called themselves the "Cattle of Ra." His cult was centered in Heliopolis, where a special burial ground existed for sacred bulls representing Ra.
title: Ra
